name: Hexe New Color Fill
description:
Hexe New Color Fill is a very addictive tangram type block puzzle game. Easy to play and suitable for both adults and children of all ages.
Features:
- Easy and fun to play, quickly mastered
- Ideal for both children and adults of all ages
- Over 200+ unique and fun puzzles that will keep you challenged
- Addictive and entertaining
- Hint system with a solution button
